attributes.action: Stop racism and give Marcus Rashford, Jadon Sancho & Bukayo Saka a knighthood.
attributes.additional_details: The England team has played really well and they are all true legends. We are all very proud what they have achieved together. It is not easy stepping up to take a penalty with the whole world watching and to be abused based on your colour on social media is not acceptable and should be stopped. A message should be sent to the people responsible for this vile and disgusting behaviour and these lads need to be knighted for their amazing work and suffering abuse after England loss against Italy.
attributes.background: We want the Government to give Marcus Rashford, Jadon Sancho & Bukayo Saka a knighthood and send a message to the world if you promote racism we will promote achievement and hard work. There should be no place for racism in society and we should stamp it out. We call on our Prime Minister to act now

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
